import { useRef } from "react"; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; export default function VirtualForm() { const form = useRef(); const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { lookingfor:'', firstname: '', lastname: '', email: '', phone:'' }, onSubmit: values => { alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }, }); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('contact_service', 'resume_template', form.current, '5yp609nAmXIULb-Yf') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); alert("Message sent") }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); } return (
